learning_outcomes.description: Be able to plan, develop and carry out an independent research project
Develop problem-solving and research skills and be able to locate and use information sources
Present research result in a written report or thesis
Obtain in-depth knowledge of the specific topic area through a thorough literature review
Present research results as an oral seminar
Become familiar with the current scientific literature to broaden knowledge and understanding of the Earth Sciences.

assessments.task_description: A progress presentation is required in the first week of the second (2nd) semester of the Honours year. This event will be scheduled for Tuesday of Teach Week 1 of the second (2nd) semester.
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description: A final report (thesis) of the Honours project will be required. The submission deadline is on Friday (2 pm) of Teaching Week 13 of the second (2nd) semester of the Honours year.
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description: A final report (thesis) of the Honours project will be required. The submission deadline is on Friday (2 pm) of Teaching Week 13 of the second (2nd) semester of the Honours year.
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to apply for an extension.
